title: Casino Directory
description: A beautifully animated interactive digital directory including a 3D CoverFlow and 3D Map

features.name: Directory Listing
info: 3D animated Coverflow
Sortable by category or alphabetically

features.name: 3D Map
info: Can be panned, rotated, and zoomed
Color coded to highlight important locations

features.name: Smart Wayfinding
info: Dynamic smart routing logic
Shortest route or under 21 route

features.name: Wayfind Management System
info: Manage nodes and paths
Single directional lines for custom traffic control
Multi floor support

title: Car Configurator
description: The Lincoln Personalization Studio is a 3D Car Configurator used at dealerships throughout China

features.name: Social Login
info: Register and Login with your WeChat account

features.name: Multiple Models
info: Supports multiple models

features.name: 3D Car Model
info: Select exterior paint
NFC enabled Paint Swatches allows users to see and feel the final physical material
Rotatable 3D Model

features.name: Interior Configuration
info: Select seat color and trim

title: Digital Art
description: Create a digital art piece simply by tweeting #UBSArt at the VIP Lounge at Art Basel 2014

features.name: Font Art
info: See your tween turned in to art in real time

features.name: Unique Pieces
info: Every piece generated is completely unique, even if you text the same thing as your friend!

title: Data Visualization
description: Several data visualization activations were created for the GE Innovation Center in Istanbul, Turkey

features.name: Innovation Barometer
info: Shows which countries are the most innovative and supportive of innovation

features.name: Trends Table
info: View articles on the latest GE innovation trends and concepts

features.name: Stylus
info: View articles on the latest GE innovation examples

title: iPad Multiplayer Game
description: At the Ford booth at Computex 2014, a japanese artist would create a drawing of you, and you will be inserted into a Find Waldo type iPad game. Race against your friend to find all the characters and items!

features.name: Put yourself in the game!
info: In collaboration with Ic4Design, a drawing of you will be inserted in to the game!

features.name: Login
info: Login to your character with the code printed on your gift postcard

features.name: Multiplayer
info: Race to find all the characters hidden in the game!

title: Christmas eCard
description: Have a Cracking Christmas by breaking open your digital christmas cracker and seeing whats inside!

features.name: Joke
info: Read hilarious dad jokes! Open more crackers to see more!

features.name: Toy Hat
info: Put on your christmas cracker hat by taking a selfie!

title: Mall Website
description: A brand new website for the Pacific Place luxury mall in Hong Kong

features.name: Responsive
info: Mobile and desktop friendly

features.name: Map location
info: See the location of shops and restaurants on a map

features.name: Cinema Integration
info: Book movie tickets immediately
